mapper.select: SELECT WH_CODE, H_CODE, H_NAME, WH_LOCATION, H_PRICE, H_FOOD, H_MIN, H_MAX, H_CONTENT, H_IMGNAME, REZCOUNT, H_DISCOUNT, H_SUBIMG FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, WH_CODE, H_CODE, H_NAME, WH_LOCATION, H_PRICE, H_FOOD, H_MIN, H_MAX, H_CONTENT, H_IMGNAME, REZCOUNT, H_DISCOUNT, H_SUBIMG FROM (SELECT A.WH_CODE WH_CODE, A.H_CODE H_CODE, NVL(A.H_NAME, '') H_NAME, NVL(B.WH_LOCATION, '') WH_LOCATION, NVL(A.H_PRICE, 0) H_PRICE, NVL(A.H_FOOD, 0) H_FOOD, NVL(A.H_MIN, 0) H_MIN, NVL(A.H_MAX, 0) H_MAX, NVL(A.H_CONTENT, '') H_CONTENT, NVL(A.H_IMGNAME, '') H_IMGNAME, NVL(A.REZCOUNT, 0) REZCOUNT, NVL(A.H_DISCOUNT, 0) H_DISCOUNT, NVL(A.H_SUBIMG, 0) H_SUBIMG FROM WD_HALL A, WD_WEDDINGHALL B WHERE A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE ORDER BY REZCOUNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 3

SELECT A.WH_CODE, A.H_CODE, NVL(A.H_NAME, '') H_NAME, NVL(B.WH_NAME, '') WH_NAME, NVL(B.WH_LOCATION, '') WH_LOCATION, NVL(B.WH_NUMBER, '') WH_NUMBER, NVL(A.H_PRICE, 0) H_PRICE, NVL(A.H_FOOD, 0) H_FOOD, NVL(A.H_MIN, 0) H_MIN, NVL(A.H_MAX, 0) H_MAX, NVL(B.WH_CONTENT, '') WH_CONTENT, NVL(A.H_CONTENT, '') H_CONTENT, NVL(A.H_IMGNAME, '') H_IMGNAME, NVL(A.REZCOUNT, 0) REZCOUNT, NVL(A.H_DISCOUNT, 0) H_DISCOUNT, NVL(A.H_SUBIMG, 0) H_SUBIMG FROM WD_HALL A, WD_WEDDINGHALL B WHERE A.WH_CODE = #{WHCode} AND A.H_CODE = #{HCode} AND A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE

SELECT WH_CODE, H_CODE, H_FILE_SEQ, NVL(H_FILE_NAME, '') H_FILE_NAME, NVL(H_FILE_ORG_NAME, '') H_FILE_ORG_NAME, NVL(H_FILE_EXT, '') H_FILE_EXT, NVL(H_FILE_SIZE, '') H_FILE_SIZE, NVL(TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE FROM WD_HALL_FILE WHERE WH_CODE = #{WHCode} AND H_CODE = #{HCode} AND H_FILE_SEQ = #{HFileSeq}

SELECT WH_CODE, H_CODE, H_NAME, WH_NAME, WH_LOCATION, WH_NUMBER, H_PRICE, H_FOOD, H_MIN, H_MAX, H_CONTENT, H_IMGNAME, REZCOUNT, H_DISCOUNT, H_SUBIMG FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, WH_CODE, H_CODE, H_NAME, WH_NAME, WH_LOCATION, WH_NUMBER, H_PRICE, H_FOOD, H_MIN, H_MAX, H_CONTENT, H_IMGNAME, REZCOUNT, H_DISCOUNT, H_SUBIMG FROM (SELECT A.WH_CODE WH_CODE, A.H_CODE H_CODE, NVL(A.H_NAME, '') H_NAME, NVL(B.WH_NAME, '') WH_NAME, NVL(B.WH_LOCATION, '') WH_LOCATION, NVL(B.WH_NUMBER, '') WH_NUMBER, NVL(A.H_PRICE, 0) H_PRICE, NVL(A.H_FOOD, 0) H_FOOD, NVL(A.H_MIN, 0) H_MIN, NVL(A.H_MAX, 0) H_MAX, NVL(A.H_CONTENT, '') H_CONTENT, NVL(A.H_IMGNAME, '') H_IMGNAME, NVL(A.REZCOUNT, 0) REZCOUNT, NVL(A.H_DISCOUNT, 0) H_DISCOUNT, NVL(A.H_SUBIMG, 0) H_SUBIMG FROM WD_HALL A, WD_WEDDINGHALL B
WHERE A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE
AND B.WH_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.H_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY WH_CODE ASC, H_CODE ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(A.H_CODE) CNT FROM WD_HALL A, WD_WEDDINGHALL B WHERE A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE
AND A.WH_CODE = #{WHCode}

SELECT WH_CODE, H_CODE, H_NAME, WH_NAME, H_PRICE, H_FOOD, H_MIN, H_MAX, H_CONTENT, H_IMGNAME, REZCOUNT, H_DISCOUNT, H_SUBIMG FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, WH_CODE, H_CODE, H_NAME, WH_NAME, H_PRICE, H_FOOD, H_MIN, H_MAX, H_CONTENT, H_IMGNAME, REZCOUNT, H_DISCOUNT, H_SUBIMG FROM (SELECT A.WH_CODE, A.H_CODE, NVL(A.H_NAME, '') AS H_NAME, NVL(B.WH_NAME, '') AS WH_NAME, NVL(A.H_PRICE, 0) AS H_PRICE, NVL(A.H_FOOD, 0) AS H_FOOD, NVL(A.H_MIN, 0) AS H_MIN, NVL(A.H_MAX, 0) AS H_MAX, NVL(A.H_CONTENT, '') AS H_CONTENT, NVL(A.H_IMGNAME, '') AS H_IMGNAME, NVL(A.REZCOUNT, 0) AS REZCOUNT, NVL(A.H_DISCOUNT, 0) AS H_DISCOUNT, NVL(A.H_SUBIMG, 0) H_SUBIMG FROM WD_HALL A, WD_WEDDINGHALL B WHERE A.WH_CODE = #{WHCode} AND A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE AND A.H_CODE NOT IN(#{HCode}))) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 4
